Use this template to create a github issue to report a bug found in either a post-release version of the system or in an area of the codebase that you are not working on during the current deliverable.

---
title: "[BUG]"
creator: []
assignees: []
---

## Summary
A clear and concise description of the bug.

## Severity
- [ ] Critical (crash, data loss, blocking)
- [ ] Major (core functionality broken)
- [ ] Minor (workaround exists)
- [ ] Trivial (cosmetic)

## Preconditions
- User logged in
- Database seeded

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Launch application...
2.
3.

## Expected Result
What should happen

## Actual Result
What actually happens

## Attachments
- (if applicable)
- Screenshots / videos

## Notes
- Frequency (always / intermittent)
- Suspected area (UI / sync / auth)
